languages.text: "Ту, что не зрит больше Завет — забрать. Отдать Ему. Она опасна. Укротить ее навек — мой долг".
"To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."
languages.original_text: "Ту, что не зрит больше Завет — забрать. Отдать Ему. Она опасна. Укротить ее навек — мой долг".

traits.locale_text: "Take the one who no longer sees Ahn'shini. Give her to Him. She is dangerous. My duty is to pacify her forever."
"Take the one who no longer sees Ahn'shini. Give her to Him. She is dangerous. My duty is to pacify her forever."
"To take the one who no longer sees Ahn'shini. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. My duty is to pacify her forever."
"To take the one who no longer sees Ahn'shini. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. My duty is to pacify her forever."
"To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."
"To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."

languages.text: « Pour éliminer celle qui ne voyait plus les Préceptes. Pour La lui envoyer. Elle est dangereuse. Pour lui apporter la paix, car tel est mon devoir. »
languages.original_text: "To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."

traits.locale_text: « Pour éliminer celle qui ne voyait plus les Préceptes. Pour La lui envoyer. Elle est dangereuse. Pour lui apporter la paix, car tel est mon devoir. »

languages.text: «Para llevarme a quien ya no sigue los preceptos. Para enviarla con Él. Es peligrosa. Pacificarla eternamente... es mi deber, y es lo que haré».
languages.original_text: "To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."

traits.locale_text: «Para llevarme a quien ya no sigue los preceptos. Para enviarla con Él. Es peligrosa. Pacificarla eternamente... es mi deber, y es lo que haré».

languages.text: 「信条を見失った者を連れて行く。彼女をあの方にお渡しする。彼女は危険です。彼女をこの先ずっと鎮めてやる…それが私の義務であり、必然なのです」
languages.original_text: "To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."

traits.locale_text: 「信条を見失った者を連れて行く。彼女をあの方にお渡しする。彼女は危険です。彼女をこの先ずっと鎮めてやる…それが私の義務であり、必然なのです」

languages.text: “带走那个再也看不到信条的人，把她交给不死之神。她很危险，我必须让她安息。这是我的职责，必须如此。”
languages.original_text: "To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."

traits.locale_text: “带走那个再也看不到信条的人，把她交给不死之神。她很危险，我必须让她安息。这是我的职责，必须如此。”

languages.text: "Sie nehmen, die die Grundsätze nicht mehr sieht. Sie Ihm übergeben. Sie ist gefährlich. Sie für immer befrieden – so lautet meine Pflicht, und so muss es sein."
languages.original_text: "To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."

traits.locale_text: "Sie nehmen, die die Grundsätze nicht mehr sieht. Sie Ihm übergeben. Sie ist gefährlich. Sie für immer befrieden – so lautet meine Pflicht, und so muss es sein."

languages.text: "Artık gözü İlkeleri görmeyenin canını almak, ruhunu O'na teslim etmek için. Kibellah, tehlike teşkil ediyor. Onu ebediyen huzura kavuşturmak... Benim vazifem. Olması gereken de bu."
languages.original_text: "To take the one who no longer sees the Tenets. To give her to Him. She is dangerous. To pacify her forever — such is my duty, and so it must be."
